article_title: Dr. Sanjay Prasad Announces Launch of SurgiPrice and Puts Patients First

article_metadata.description: ROCKVILLE, Md., Sept. 16, 2014 /PRNewswire/ -- SurgiPrice, LLC is pleased to announce the launch of its innovative online bidding platform for surgical care that puts the patient first (http://www.SurgiPrice.com).  Founder and CEO, Dr. Sanjay Prasad,
article_metadata.author: PRNewswire
